Posted By: SocialExperiment (9/28/2009 10:49:22 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Wizards has some strange sort of humor, but i had a good laugh nonetheless.  
  
Did they need some really awkward cards for drafting?  
Or were they in fact just like printing junk aside from the fact that Zendikar has lots of greatly playable black Vampire cards. Wait that's it, i guess they wanted to emphasize the huge contrast single-black colored and a double-black colored cards can have. If that's the case - awesome job! :D  
Whatever the reason of making such a card was, this card takes in a new place in my "worst-cards-ever-collection".  
Definitely a good pick for a [Chimney Imp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chimney Imp) deck.
posts.html:
Wizards has some strange sort of humor, but i had a good laugh nonetheless.

Did they need some really awkward cards for drafting?
Or were they in fact just like printing junk aside from the fact that Zendikar has lots of greatly playable black Vampire cards. Wait that's it, i guess they wanted to emphasize the huge contrast single-black colored and a double-black colored cards can have. If that's the case - awesome job! :D
Whatever the reason of making such a card was, this card takes in a new place in my "worst-cards-ever-collection".
Definitely a good pick for a Chimney Imp deck.
